meanings.definition: A person who creates abstract art.
meanings.sent1: The abstracters painted colorful shapes on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: Many abstracters prefer to use bold colors in their artwork.
meanings.sent3: The abstracters' paintings made people stop and think.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an abstracters' studio, full of creativity and imagination.
meanings.sent5: The abstracters' work was so unique, it stood out among other artists.

meanings.definition: A company or individual who specializes in abstracting information or data.
meanings.sent1: The abstracters organized the data into easy-to-understand charts.
meanings.sent2: Abstracters play a crucial role in simplifying complex information.
meanings.sent3: The abstracters made the boring data look interesting.
meanings.sent4: Their ability to extract key details made them the best abstracters in town.
meanings.sent5: The abstracters' reports were clear and concise, making decision-making easier.

meanings.definition: A person who abstracts or summarizes information.
meanings.sent1: As an abstracters, she condensed the lengthy report into a single page.
meanings.sent2: The abstracters highlighted the main points for easy reference.
meanings.sent3: The abstracters' summary was so well-written, it became a bestseller.
meanings.sent4: His skill as an abstracters saved time for everyone in the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The abstracters' ability to capture the essence of a story was unmatched.
